name: No Escape (itch) (NoEscape)
description:
Society has become overpopulated, so the only natural thing to do is put all of your prisoners into a death maze and have them live out the rest of their days in the maze. You have been thrown into this maze for being medically insane. After some time you are out of supplies and must go through a try to survive this hell hole and maybe if you're lucky enough, actually escape the maze and society's evil game.

Download the Zip Folder

Unzip It

Double Click the EXE
